verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%>

To the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> which are at <S%G1722><s%> Colosse: <S%G2857><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be unto you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

We give thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%>

Since we heard <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G26><s%> which ye <S%G3588><s%> have to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints. <S%G40><s%>

For <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> which is laid up <S%G606><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> ye heard before <S%G4257><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel; <S%G2098><s%>

Which is come <S%G3918><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it <S%G2532><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world; <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2076><s%> bringeth forth fruit, <S%G2592><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it doth also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> ye heard <S%G191><s%> of it, and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1921><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth: <S%G225><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> ye also <S%G2532><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> dear <S%G27><s%> fellow servant, <S%G4889><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> declared <S%G1213><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> love <S%G26><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> it, do not <S%G3756><s%> cease <S%G3973><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to desire <S%G154><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might be filled <S%G4137><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> understanding; <S%G4907><s%>

That ye <S%G5209><s%> might walk <S%G4043><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> pleasing, <S%G699><s%> being fruitful <S%G2592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> increasing <S%G837><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Strengthened <S%G1412><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> might, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> glorious <S%G1391><s%> power, <S%G2904><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joyfulness; <S%G5479><s%>

Giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> which hath made us meet <S%G2427><s%> <S%G2248><s%> to be partakers <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3310><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> inheritance <S%G2819><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> light: <S%G5457><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> hath delivered <S%G4506><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath translated <S%G3179><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> dear <S%G26><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> even the <S%G3588><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins: <S%G266><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> invisible <S%G517><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> creature: <S%G2937><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> were all things <S%G3956><s%> created, <S%G2936><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> visible <S%G3707><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> invisible, <S%G517><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> they be thrones, <S%G2362><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> dominions, <S%G2963><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> principalities, <S%G746><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> powers: <S%G1849><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> were created <S%G2936><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> him: <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> consist. <S%G4921><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church: <S%G1577><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead; <S%G3498><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things he <S%G846><s%> might have <S%G1096><s%> the preeminence. <S%G4409><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> it pleased <S%G2106><s%> the Father that in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should all <S%G3956><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> dwell; <S%G2730><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> having made peace <S%G1517><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to reconcile <S%G604><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> himself; <S%G848><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> I say, whether <S%G1535><s%> they be things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that were <S%G5607><s%> sometime <S%G4218><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> in your mind <S%G1271><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> hath he reconciled <S%G604><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unblamable <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unreprovable <S%G410><s%> in his sight: <S%G2714><s%> <S%G848><s%>

If <S%G1489><s%> ye continue <S%G1961><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> settled, <S%G1476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> moved away <S%G3334><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have heard, <S%G191><s%> and which was preached <S%G2784><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is under <S%G5259><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> am made <S%G1096><s%> a minister; <S%G1249><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fill up <S%G466><s%> that which is behind <S%G5303><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> for his body's sake, <S%G5228><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4983><s%> which is <S%G3603><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church: <S%G1577><s%>

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am made <S%G1096><s%> a minister, <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> to fulfill <S%G4137><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Even the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> which hath been hid <S%G613><s%> from <S%G575><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> generations, <S%G1074><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> is made manifest <S%G5319><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> saints: <S%G40><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> make known <S%G1107><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of glory: <S%G1391><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> preach, <S%G2605><s%> warning <S%G3560><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom; <S%G4678><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may present <S%G3936><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> labor, <S%G2872><s%> striving <S%G75><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> working, <S%G1753><s%> which worketh <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> mightily. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1411><s%>
